entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Snow level 700 metres. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
